docs.title: Class: RadiocarbonDate
docs.text:
A radiocarbon date measurement with associated metadata.

URI: c14:RadiocarbonDate

 classDiagram
    class RadiocarbonDate
    click RadiocarbonDate href "../RadiocarbonDate/"
      RadiocarbonDate : conventional_age

      RadiocarbonDate : lab_id

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance lab_id 1  String The unique identifier assigned to the radiocarbon date by the laboratory direct conventional_age 1  Integer The conventional radiocarbon age in years BP (Before Present, where direct

docs.text: used by used in type used RadiocarbonDateCollection entries range RadiocarbonDate

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: RadiocarbonDate
description: A radiocarbon date measurement with associated metadata.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/MIxS-MInAS/miaard
slots:
- lab_id
- conventional_age

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: RadiocarbonDate
description: A radiocarbon date measurement with associated metadata.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/MIxS-MInAS/miaard
attributes:
  lab_id:
    name: lab_id
    description: 'The unique identifier assigned to the radiocarbon date by the laboratory

      that performed the measurement including the lab specific suffix.'
    title: Laboratory Identifier of Date Measurement
    examples:
    - value: A 0034
    - value: AA 12345
    - value: Beta 987654
    - value: CN-XX 1234
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/MIxS-MInAS/miaard
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: c14:000001
    alias: lab_id
    owner: RadiocarbonDate
    domain_of:
    - RadiocarbonDate
    range: string
    required: true
    multivalued: false
    pattern: ^[A-Za-z-]+ [0-9]+$
  conventional_age:
    name: conventional_age
    description: 'The conventional radiocarbon age in years BP (Before Present, where

      Present is defined as AD 1950) as calculated by the laboratory.'
    title: Conventional Radiocarbon Age
    examples:
    - value: '4500'
    - value: '12345'
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/MIxS-MInAS/miaard
    rank: 1000
    slot_uri: c14:000002
    alias: conventional_age
    owner: RadiocarbonDate
    domain_of:
    - RadiocarbonDate
    range: integer
    required: true
    multivalued: false

docs.title: Slot: Conventional Radiocarbon Age (conventional_age)
docs.text:
The conventional radiocarbon age in years BP (Before Present, where

Present is defined as AD 1950) as calculated by the laboratory.

docs.title: Slot: Laboratory Identifier of Date Measurement (lab_id)
docs.text:
The unique identifier assigned to the radiocarbon date by the laboratory

that performed the measurement including the lab specific suffix.

URI: c14:000001 Alias: lab_id

docs.title: Applicable Classes
docs.text: Name Description Modifies Slot RadiocarbonDate A radiocarbon date measurement with associated metadata no

docs.title: Properties
docs.text:
• Range: String

  • Required: True

  • Regex pattern: ^[A-Za-z-]+ [0-9]+$

docs.title: Examples
